public class Player

Class representing a player sprite (one per level)

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player​(java.lang.String movementConfig, java.lang.String attackingConfig, int x, int y)
      Create a new Player sprite (MovingSprite)
      Parameters:
      movementConfig - path of texture atlas movement config file (.txt)
      attackingConfig - path of texture atlas attacking config file (.txt)
      x - position of Tile (within tile grid) to place sprite
      y - position of Tile (within tile grid) to place sprite
